CustomField.formula: IF (BEGINS( OwnerId, "005"),Owner:User.Service_Level_c__c, CASE( Owner:Queue.QueueName, "Global Service Desk Level 1", "Service Desk Level 1", "Global Service Desk Level 2", "Service Desk Level 2", "Priority Service", "Service Desk Level 2", "Global Service Desk Level 3 IT", "Service Desk Level 3", "Global Svc Desk L3 - Finance", "Service Desk Finance Level 3", "Global Svc Desk L3 - Trans Monitoring", "Service Desk Finance Level 3", "Global Svc Desk L3 - Chargeback & Fraud", "Service Desk Finance Level 3", "Global Svc Desk L3 - VANS Billing", "Service Desk Finance Level 3", "Global Svc Desk L3 - Banking Ops", "Service Desk Finance Level 3", "Global Service Desk Level 3 Finance", "Service Desk Finance Level 3", "Global Service Desk Level 3 Delivery", "Service Desk Level 3", "Quarterly Enhancements", "Service Desk Level 3", "VANs Billing Queue", "Service Desk Finance Level 3", null))
CustomField.label: Assignee Service Level
